sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import {useDispatch} from 'react-redux'; import {Step,Icon,Button, Label,Item ,Divider,Header,Grid, Segment, Table, List, Image, Confirm} from 'semantic-ui-react'; import { assignTask, postTasks } from '../../redux/slices/Task'; import moment from "moment"; import ReactPlayer from 'react-player'; export default function SendTask(props) { const [activeIndex,setActiveIndex] = useState(); const dispatch = useDispatch(); const [scrollPosition,setScrollPosition] = useState(0); const onSubmitAssignTask = ()=>{ //dispatch(assignTask(props.data)); } var step=3; const onSubmitSaveTask = ()=>{ dispatch(postTasks(props.data)); props.nextStep(step+1); } const handleClick = (e,title) =>{ const newIndex = activeIndex === title.index ? -1 : title.index setActiveIndex(newIndex) } const changeScrollPosition = (newScrollPosition) => { setScrollPosition(newScrollPosition) } const [open,setOpen] = useState(false) const [close,setClose] = useState(false) const clicOpen = () =>{ setOpen(true) } const clicConfirm = () =>{ dispatch(postTasks(props.data)); props.nextStep(step+1); setOpen(false) } const clicConfirmAssign = () =>{ console.log("cc") console.log(props.data); dispatch(assignTask(props.data)); props.nextStep(step+1); setOpen(false) } const clicClose = () =>{ setOpen(false) } return (
Info Task
{props.data.title} {moment(props.data.endDate).format("MMMM Do yy")} {props.data.description} Helen Christian Daniel Daniel Daniel Daniel
Questions
{props.data.typeTask ==='Quiz' ? ( props.data.listQuestion.map((quiz,index) => {quiz.fquestion + "?"} {quiz.foptionA} {quiz.foptionB} {quiz.foptionC} {quiz.foptionD}
) ) : ( !props.data.listQuestion ? ( <> ) : ( {props.data.listQuestion.map((files, index) => files.split(".").pop() === "pdf" || files.split(".").pop() === "pptx" || files.split(".").pop() === "docx" ? (
{files.split("-").pop().slice(0,7)+ "."+ files.split(".").pop()}
{files.split("-").pop().slice(0,7)+ "."+ files.split(".").pop()} File
) : files.split(".").pop() === "mp3" || files.split(".").pop() === "mp4" ? ( ) : files.split(".").pop() === "png" || files.split(".").pop() === "jpg" || files.split(".").pop() === "jpeg" || files.split(".").pop() === "gif" ? (
{files.split("-").pop().slice(0,7)+ "."+ files.split(".").pop()}
{files.split(".").pop()} File
) : ( // // //
{files.split("-").pop().slice(0,7)+ "."+ files.split(".").pop()}
{files.split("-").pop().slice(0,7)+ "."+ files.split(".").pop()} File
) )} ) )}
) }
